front.title: Using Saratoga with a Bundle Agent as a Convergence Layer for Delay- Tolerant Networking

abstract.t: Saratoga is a simple, lightweight, UDP-based transfer protocol. This describes how to use Saratoga as a Delay-Tolerant Networking (DTN) "convergence layer" with the Bundle Protocol and its Bundle Agents, building on the Saratoga specification in draft-wood-tsvwg-saratoga.
